name: Space Journey (itch) (Andrea1141)
description:
Your goal is to reach the planet with the flag as quickly as possible.

The rocket needs fuel, that you can obtain standing only on planets resembling the Earth, with some clouds and oceans.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Rocket Controls

R - Reload Level

ESC - Pause Level

That's my third game, made with Godot for the Gotm.io game jam #3.

Unfortunately there are some audio issues due to the HTML5 export. If you want to play the game with the perfect audio, you can download it for Windows and Linux. 

Music: https://www.bensound.com
